message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_XRV_EXISTING_OVERLAP
message.locale: More than 1 overlapping Assessment has been found.

message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_XRV_OVERLAP_FOUND
message.locale: This period of this assessment overlaps with that of an existing assessment of this type.

message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_FV_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add a Rules Set as this Assessment is canceled
You cannot add a Rules Set as this Assessment is cancelled

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTRULESLINK_FV_ACTIVE_RULE_SETS
message.locale: You cannot cancel this Assessment as there are active Rule Sets associated with it

message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_CREATION_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a creation date
